weka.gui.visualize

Interface AttributePanelListener


  • public interface AttributePanelListener
    Interface for classes that want to listen for Attribute selection changes in the attribute panel

    $Revision: 1.5 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
